title: 55+ Winter Nail Designs
description: Bring on the snow days and hot chocolate now that winter is almost here! Whether you are curled up by a fire or about to get a few drinks après ski, we’ve got the winter nail design ideas to keep your manicure on point all winter long. From sweater nails, shades of blues, chrome designs,…
author: Laura Gummerman
excerpt: Bring on the snow days and hot chocolate now that winter is almost here! Whether you are curled up by a fire or about to get a few drinks après ski, we’ve got the winter nail design ideas to keep your manicure on point all winter long. From sweater nails, shades of blues, chrome designs,…
text: Bring on the snow days and hot chocolate now that winter is almost here! Whether you are curled up by a fire or about to get a few drinks après ski, we’ve got the winter nail design ideas to keep your manicure on point all winter long. From sweater nails, shades of blues, chrome designs, cute snowy trees, snowmen, holiday looks, or glittery silver sparkles, use these inspiration photos for your next winter manicure—we’ve got simple classic designs and fun nail trends to suit everyone! Looking for more nail design ideas? Check out: 55+ Christmas Nail Designs Nail Design Ideas (125+ ideas!) 30+ Chrome Nail Designs 100+ Summer Nail Designs 60+ Spring Nail Designs 45+ Easter Nail Ideas 45+ Halloween Nails Get The Perfect Manicure at Home At home winter nails vs. salon nails: While you can do so many manicure looks at home now with gel manicure kits, it can be a little intimidating to some who are not as steady with their hands or just generally prefer the pampered experience at their local nail salon. While gel manicures will generally last longer than traditional polish (usually 2-3 weeks for a gel manicure), there are traditional polish brands that boast several weeks of wear from their products with a good top coat and you don’t have the longer gel removal process at home if you choose to take off your own polish. Some of the trickier techniques like chrome or magnetic polish also might be a little easier in the hands of a professional, but if you have a gel nail kit at home, they are looks that are fun to try and master. Of course, doing a press-on nail is the easiest way to get your perfect winter style at home by yourself, so there’s no shame in finding your favorite look and grabbing your nail glue. Winter Nail Ideas: Icy Waves These blue nails are all dressed up in a winter color palette with silver sparkly waves that will add glam to any winter outfit. Snowy Sweater These half sweater nails are Instagram ready and a great way to add in a sweater texture accent to a nude nail. Blue Gradient Tips Bring in all your favorite blues, from navy to baby, to create a gradient look with blue tips that will look cool all winter long. Winter Wonderland These shimmering white cat eye nails are perfect for the snowy winter season. Baby Blue Accents Bring out the perfect shade of baby blue for the season and accent your nails with a sweater pattern and a few dazzling snowflakes for some delicate winter nail art. Ornament Nails Our favorite winter nail designs usually involve some sort of glitter, so how cute are these tiny 3D ornaments that accent this sparkly design? Chrome Snowflakes This winter nail look features chrome icy blue nails under some delicate white snowflakes. Fir Forest Use a small detail brush to add a snowy Christmas wonderland to your nails with this winter design. Sparkle French Outlines This nail design adds a blue sparkle French tip outline over a gradient tip for some winter glamour on your fingertips. Half Moon Merlot This eye-catching half moon design done in a deep merlot color is the perfect red to carry you through the winter season. Sweater Weather These blue sweater nails with a matte finish are just about as cute as you can get for winter—it’s like a cozy sweater for each finger! Reindeer Love This sweet little reindeer is ready to join Santa’s sleigh! Try just one as an accent nail or add to every nail for a whole team. Oh Christmas Tree Bring the holiday spirit to your nails with this pretty Christmas tree and sweater nail accent. Sweet Snowmen What’s better than a cute snowman in the middle of winter? Having a few on your pink manicure perhaps … Frosty Accents This winter mood is downright storybook and cute through Christmas and beyond. Snow and Ice Adding some silver sparkle and rhinestone accents are cute for any snowy evening out. Blue Sparkle Tips Choose a few different blue (like a midnight blue and a lighter shade) to create a layered French manicure and add a cool chill to your manicure. Silver Chains These chrome silver chains over a classic French manicure add a little shimmer to a more basic look. Ice Ice Baby These light blue cat eye nails with a snowflake detail are perfection for short winter nails. Mad For Plaid This red and burgundy plaid is what holiday dreams are made of! Add a few snowflake accents and your look is holiday party ready. Green Velvet This minty green cat eye mani gives the look of soft velvet and it’s so pretty! Cat eye effects are pretty on both long and short nails, so feel free to try it no matter your nail length. Classic Christmas Plaid What’s more classic than a red and green plaid manicure for the holiday season? You can also do just a few accent nails with this look for a toned down version. Snow Way You don’t have to give up pink nails in winter! Keep your favorite shade and add some pretty snowflakes over top. Polar Bear Express This sweet polar bear is a cute choice to keep you company this winter. Peek A Boo These nude and black nails with a negative space heart are the perfect neutral nail for winter. Glitter Lined For a holiday twist on the classic French manicure, try this doubled lined glitter option to add a little ooh la la. Evergreen Accents This deep forest green manicure has all the classic looks of French tips with a fun present bow accent nail. Holiday Bows Add some girly flair to your classic French manicure with this red bow design. Beary Christmas This cutie Christmas bear manicure is ready for winter with just a few sweet nail stickers. Hint of Black Add a bit of drama to your nails with these sleek nails that have just the bottom side dipped in black polish. Silver Tips Add some silver chrome to your French manicure with these shiny tips. Lace and Pearls Add the look of lace and pearls to your Easter manicure for a fun yet sophisticated look. Peppermint Patty These peppermint red and white nails are just right to be the star of any holiday party. Winter Pearls These half moon pearl accent nails remind us of snowballs and would look pretty with just about any outfit. Blue Babe These squared off tips are accented with a pretty chrome blue hue. Pearlized Cranberry Pearl nails are super trendy and you can mix and match French tips and full color nails in a deep red shade. Snowy Day These pearlized white nails look like ice crystals on a snowy morning. Winter Blues These are the winter blues you DO want! Gradient baby blue turns to a snowy white polish with this pretty manicure. Frosted Tips These 3D sparkling snow banks are so fun and bring a little whimsy to your manicure. All That Glitters These glitter ombre nails will bring just the right amount of sparkle to your winter season. Christmas Checkers This trendy manicure brings in all the fun of the checkered print in a classic festive green shade. Icy White These hologram nails remind us of pretty icicles and will still look on trend for New Year’s Eve. Golden Touch Whether you want some holiday sparkle or some bling for NYE, this look will help you shine. Emerald Green French Pick your favorite shade of green and do a French tip for a colorful take on a classic. Mistletoe Lane Wear this sweet mistletoe manicure design and you just might get your crush to kiss you this holiday season! Try dabbing some glitter polish on the end of your nails with a makeup sponge and then paint on or use small nail stickers to decorate. Hot Coco Vibes As if you need an excuse to get hot chocolate, give these hot coco nails a try! Rose Gold Shimmer This design with double outlined glitter French tips is perfect for Christmas into New Year’s Eve. Silver Bells These silver glitter French tip outlines are just the right touch of sparkle. Candy Cane Lane An all over candy cane design is sure to keep your nails looking sweet this Christmas. Snow Place Like Home These large snowflakes make a statement on each nail and on a nude background they are subtle yet sweet. Mirror Ball These short silver chrome nails are the ultimate in trendy nails. Burgundy-Kissed Tips For a pop of holiday color, these French burgundy nails are perfect to keep things classy but festive. Hologram Holidays Since the holidays are officially sponsored by all things glittery, these icy hologram nails will look great by the fire as well as by the disco ball for New Year’s Eve. Sparkle Black French Adding some sparkle under a black French tip manicure brings some fun into a classic look. Snow Drifts These white abstract swirls remind us of curving snow drifts in winter (and they would be really pretty in white glitter too!). Looking for more nail ideas? html:
Bring on the snow days and hot chocolate now that winter is almost here! Whether you are curled up by a fire or about to get a few drinks après ski, we’ve got the winter nail design ideas to keep your manicure on point all winter long.

From sweater nails, shades of blues, chrome designs, cute snowy trees, snowmen, holiday looks, or glittery silver sparkles, use these inspiration photos for your next winter manicure—we’ve got simple classic designs and fun nail trends to suit everyone!

Looking for more nail design ideas? Check out:

  • 55+ Christmas Nail Designs
  • Nail Design Ideas (125+ ideas!)
  • 30+ Chrome Nail Designs
  • 100+ Summer Nail Designs
  • 60+ Spring Nail Designs
  • 45+ Easter Nail Ideas
  • 45+ Halloween Nails
  • Get The Perfect Manicure at Home

At home winter nails vs. salon nails:

While you can do so many manicure looks at home now with gel manicure kits, it can be a little intimidating to some who are not as steady with their hands or just generally prefer the pampered experience at their local nail salon.

While gel manicures will generally last longer than traditional polish (usually 2-3 weeks for a gel manicure), there are traditional polish brands that boast several weeks of wear from their products with a good top coat and you don’t have the longer gel removal process at home if you choose to take off your own polish.

Some of the trickier techniques like chrome or magnetic polish also might be a little easier in the hands of a professional, but if you have a gel nail kit at home, they are looks that are fun to try and master.

Of course, doing a press-on nail is the easiest way to get your perfect winter style at home by yourself, so there’s no shame in finding your favorite look and grabbing your nail glue.

Winter Nail Ideas:

Icy Waves

These blue nails are all dressed up in a winter color palette with silver sparkly waves that will add glam to any winter outfit.

Snowy Sweater

These half sweater nails are Instagram ready and a great way to add in a sweater texture accent to a nude nail.

Blue Gradient Tips

Bring in all your favorite blues, from navy to baby, to create a gradient look with blue tips that will look cool all winter long.

Winter Wonderland

These shimmering white cat eye nails are perfect for the snowy winter season.

Baby Blue Accents

Bring out the perfect shade of baby blue for the season and accent your nails with a sweater pattern and a few dazzling snowflakes for some delicate winter nail art.

Ornament Nails

Our favorite winter nail designs usually involve some sort of glitter, so how cute are these tiny 3D ornaments that accent this sparkly design?

Chrome Snowflakes

This winter nail look features chrome icy blue nails under some delicate white snowflakes.

Fir Forest

Use a small detail brush to add a snowy Christmas wonderland to your nails with this winter design.

Sparkle French Outlines

This nail design adds a blue sparkle French tip outline over a gradient tip for some winter glamour on your fingertips.

Half Moon Merlot

This eye-catching half moon design done in a deep merlot color is the perfect red to carry you through the winter season.

Sweater Weather

These blue sweater nails with a matte finish are just about as cute as you can get for winter—it’s like a cozy sweater for each finger!

Reindeer Love

This sweet little reindeer is ready to join Santa’s sleigh! Try just one as an accent nail or add to every nail for a whole team.

Oh Christmas Tree

Bring the holiday spirit to your nails with this pretty Christmas tree and sweater nail accent.

Sweet Snowmen

What’s better than a cute snowman in the middle of winter? Having a few on your pink manicure perhaps …

Frosty Accents

This winter mood is downright storybook and cute through Christmas and beyond.

Snow and Ice

Adding some silver sparkle and rhinestone accents are cute for any snowy evening out.

Blue Sparkle Tips

Choose a few different blue (like a midnight blue and a lighter shade) to create a layered French manicure and add a cool chill to your manicure.

Silver Chains

These chrome silver chains over a classic French manicure add a little shimmer to a more basic look.

Ice Ice Baby

These light blue cat eye nails with a snowflake detail are perfection for short winter nails.

Mad For Plaid

This red and burgundy plaid is what holiday dreams are made of! Add a few snowflake accents and your look is holiday party ready.

Green Velvet

This minty green cat eye mani gives the look of soft velvet and it’s so pretty! Cat eye effects are pretty on both long and short nails, so feel free to try it no matter your nail length.

Classic Christmas Plaid

What’s more classic than a red and green plaid manicure for the holiday season? You can also do just a few accent nails with this look for a toned down version.

Snow Way

You don’t have to give up pink nails in winter! Keep your favorite shade and add some pretty snowflakes over top.

Polar Bear Express

This sweet polar bear is a cute choice to keep you company this winter.

Peek A Boo

These nude and black nails with a negative space heart are the perfect neutral nail for winter.

Glitter Lined

For a holiday twist on the classic French manicure, try this doubled lined glitter option to add a little ooh la la.

Evergreen Accents

This deep forest green manicure has all the classic looks of French tips with a fun present bow accent nail.

Holiday Bows

Add some girly flair to your classic French manicure with this red bow design.

Beary Christmas

This cutie Christmas bear manicure is ready for winter with just a few sweet nail stickers.

Hint of Black

Add a bit of drama to your nails with these sleek nails that have just the bottom side dipped in black polish.

Silver Tips

Add some silver chrome to your French manicure with these shiny tips.

Lace and Pearls

Add the look of lace and pearls to your Easter manicure for a fun yet sophisticated look.

Peppermint Patty

These peppermint red and white nails are just right to be the star of any holiday party.

Winter Pearls

These half moon pearl accent nails remind us of snowballs and would look pretty with just about any outfit.

Blue Babe

These squared off tips are accented with a pretty chrome blue hue.

Pearlized Cranberry

Pearl nails are super trendy and you can mix and match French tips and full color nails in a deep red shade.

Snowy Day

These pearlized white nails look like ice crystals on a snowy morning.

Winter Blues

These are the winter blues you DO want! Gradient baby blue turns to a snowy white polish with this pretty manicure.

Frosted Tips

These 3D sparkling snow banks are so fun and bring a little whimsy to your manicure.

All That Glitters

These glitter ombre nails will bring just the right amount of sparkle to your winter season.

Christmas Checkers

This trendy manicure brings in all the fun of the checkered print in a classic festive green shade.

Icy White

These hologram nails remind us of pretty icicles and will still look on trend for New Year’s Eve.

Golden Touch

Whether you want some holiday sparkle or some bling for NYE, this look will help you shine.

Emerald Green French

Pick your favorite shade of green and do a French tip for a colorful take on a classic.

Mistletoe Lane

Wear this sweet mistletoe manicure design and you just might get your crush to kiss you this holiday season! Try dabbing some glitter polish on the end of your nails with a makeup sponge and then paint on or use small nail stickers to decorate.

Hot Coco Vibes

As if you need an excuse to get hot chocolate, give these hot coco nails a try!

Rose Gold Shimmer

This design with double outlined glitter French tips is perfect for Christmas into New Year’s Eve.

Silver Bells

These silver glitter French tip outlines are just the right touch of sparkle.

Candy Cane Lane

An all over candy cane design is sure to keep your nails looking sweet this Christmas.

Snow Place Like Home

These large snowflakes make a statement on each nail and on a nude background they are subtle yet sweet.

Mirror Ball

These short silver chrome nails are the ultimate in trendy nails.

Burgundy-Kissed Tips

For a pop of holiday color, these French burgundy nails are perfect to keep things classy but festive.

Hologram Holidays

Since the holidays are officially sponsored by all things glittery, these icy hologram nails will look great by the fire as well as by the disco ball for New Year’s Eve.

Sparkle Black French

Adding some sparkle under a black French tip manicure brings some fun into a classic look.

Snow Drifts

These white abstract swirls remind us of curving snow drifts in winter (and they would be really pretty in white glitter too!).

Looking for more nail ideas? Check out:

  • Easy Galaxy Nails Tutorial (with Video!)
  • Easy Gold Stripe Nail Tutorial
  • 10 Easy Nail Art Tutorials (Step-by-Step)
  • Emoji Nail Decal DIY
